umontreal.iro.lecuyer.randvar

Class HalfNormalGen

  • java.lang.Object
    • umontreal.iro.lecuyer.randvar.RandomVariateGen
      • umontreal.iro.lecuyer.randvar.HalfNormalGen

  • public class HalfNormalGen
extends RandomVariateGen
    This class implements methods for generating random variates from the half-normal distribution with parameters μ and σ > 0. Its density is

    f (x) = ((2/π)1/2/σ)e-(x-μ)2/(2σ2),        for x > = μ,

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double mu 
      protected double sigma 

      • Fields inherited from class umontreal.iro.lecuyer.randvar.RandomVariateGen

        dist, stream

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HalfNormalGen(RandomStream s, double mu, double sigma)
      Creates a new half-normal generator with parameters μ = mu and σ = sigma, using stream s.
      HalfNormalGen(RandomStream s, HalfNormalDist dist)
      Creates a new generator for the distribution dist, using stream s.
